full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 PLACE ICM MEDICAL SERVICES MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF VISA APPLICANTS DATE OF EXAMINATION SUANPHLU T.C. 13 FEB 87 CITY COUNTRY At the request of the American Consul at BANGKOK THAILAND I certify that on the above date I examined AGE SEX NAME 390 LU CAM TIEU T-V-14548 20 APR 15 M (71Y) I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions : CLASS A : DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES : Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious-stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more MINU CASE Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (see proviso, Sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) CLASS B : Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree of Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C : Minor Conditions. [CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2) ] My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed : P 98 BP 120/80 (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability or previous occurrence of one or more attack of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C- diagnosis, and pertinent details *) : Class B Disability CORONARY INSUFFICIENCY, MITRAL STENOSIS, CARDIOMEGALY PROGRESSIVE. 13 FEB. 87 Chest P.A. erect position. Impression: Progressive Chest X-ray report cardiomegaly with LVE and pulmonary congestion in comparison with film on 12/11/85, 18/11/86. 13 FEB. 87 RPR-NON REACTIVE Blood serological report from Dr.- BANGKOK GENERAL HOSPITAL Other special report (s) (When needed) from Dr.- BANGKOK GENERAL HOSPITAL from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR hair hyper TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT Dr. Kare Thorgersen 17 FEB. 87 ICM Medical Officer 50157-101 * Continue on reverse side if necessary * GPO : 1975 OL-580-458 (79-1) OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Formerly FS-398) January 1975 DEPT. OF STATE
